allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
MVP v2.7: AI Virtual Stylist, enhanced studio UX, Vercel deploy fix

- Add AI Virtual Stylist system with 4 personas \(NOVA/ONYX/LORE/PRISM\)
  powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash + Google Search Grounding
- Studio: redesigned loading animation with step icons and progress dots
- Studio: per-image stylist feedback \(Plan A - select image first\)
- Studio: advice-to-prompt reformatting with keyword extraction
- Studio: advice modal with editable prompt and collapsible original advice
- Landing: fix Best Picks layout to portrait 3:4 ratio \(match generated images\)
- Landing: restore Korean text corrupted by external tool
- Gallery/Login: wrap useSearchParams in Suspense for Next.js 16 build
- Stylist prompts: Korean-first output \(2-3 English terms max\), 3-5 lines
- Add rewarded ad unlock system for locked stylist feedback
- Add boost, comments, notifications, tags, simulation API routes
- Add StylistFeedbackCard, CheeringBadge, SearchOverlay components
- Update docs: TODO, guidelines, API contracts, data model

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
